data.title: Fraternities and Sororities
data.meta_description: UCCS Fraternity and Sorority life helps students form connections with their community and gain leadership skills.
data.text:
Joining a Fraternity or Sorority at UCCS is more than simply participating in a club or activity, it opens new doors and allows you opportunities to build deeper relationships, experience leadership, contribute to your community, and find academic success. As this will be a lifelong commitment, you will find it important to do research and join the right organization for you.

If you are interested in learning more and/or joining an organization, please email studlife@uccs.edu.
